website_summaries.verdict: The Xbox One S is a great introductory model and features a compact form factor that works well for small spaces.
pros: Includes the critically acclaimed Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
Always at least $50 cheaper than a standard Xbox One S. The extra storage is perfect for digital gaming with Xbox Live and Xbox Game Pass
cons: A few reports of defective controllers

website_summaries.verdict: A stellar way for Star Wars fans to make the jump to Xbox One with a gorgeously colored console and a set of ultra-special cosmetics to proudly wear.
pros: Can display select titles in checkerboard 4K
Has VR functionality with the PSVR (sold separately)
Sony's platform has more/better exclusive titles and often has limited-time exclusivity deals on DLC for major games
cons: Jedi: Fallen Order isn't exclusive to Xbox

customer_reviews.title: It's all good now!!!  Awesome system!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Previously (3 stars) because pre-buy description seemed untrue....2 games said to be included in the 'bundle' were not included. UPDATED: (5 stars) I received the codes to unlock the other two games from Amazon today...thus the description of the preorder is now accurate. I am loving the graphics and the game play!!! I don't know why it took me so long to buy an Xbox. This is my first Xbox system. Usually do Nintendo products, but have gotten tired of being out dated as soon as I buy the product. I like Xbox seems backward compatible. My whole family is enjoying the gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: michael deaton

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as advertised by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Did anybody else get the two additional games advertised with their pre-order? I did not....no physical games, no code card. The xbox One S TB came with a controller, cords, a code card for Jedi Fallen Order deluxe, a double sided card for Live Gold and Game Pass. Do the Knights of the Old Republic and KORII Sith Lords games ship seperately? I have to ask this here because there is no place to ask Amazon to address the missing items from the order.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJS

customer_reviews.title: Missing preorder games!
customer_reviews.text: Missing the two of the three games that were supposed to ship with it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Bundle does NOT include KOTOR 1&2 as you are led to believe. Very disappointed in the bait and switch tactics.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pre order games from the bundle.
customer_reviews.text: Missing the pre order games KOTOR and KOTR Sith Lords. Can only imagine the headache coming when I try to talk to customer support about this. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Subzz997

customer_reviews.title: Not a preorder deal! Very misleading!
customer_reviews.text: No preorder items as promised! I’m not happy and returning it since Microsoft won’t help and Amazon won’t as well. I’ll pay $120 less for this bundle at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Bellatora

customer_reviews.title: Missing Games. Hoping for solution soon
customer_reviews.text: Like the others, I am missing the codes for the other two games. I'm hoping that continued outcry elicits a response and solution soon!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Coronel

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING DEAL!!! Must Read!
customer_reviews.text: Total price for this came to $170 which is an awesome deal Amazon had on Black Friday. The Xbox One S is a great system unless you have a 4K tv there is no reason to get the more expensive version. The people complaining about this need to learn how to read and they are full of crap about the packaging. Amazon/Microsoft ships these use in a brown box with padding. Also, great deal, because it comes with 1 month, live and 1-month game pass plus the new STAR WARS GAME!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!!!!
customer_reviews.text: With a huge library of great games at reduced prices this system makes sense for me. It wasn't too hard on the budget and looks nice and clean in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: When the order was received did not contain all the digital code for the games as described in the order description. After contacting customer support multiple times they were not able to give me the codes I did not give a satisfying action answer to why they were not available. When review in my order the description of the product had changed and the additional games that were supposed to come with the bundle we’re conspicuously removed from the product description. After many calls to customer support and hours on hold the problem has not been resolved very unsatisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Godec

customer_reviews.title: Under promised / broken
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I was very excited because I thought I had bought the Xbox one with the three games shown. When I opened the package I only found the one. Then as soon as it turned on the fan started clicking and sounded off like something is wrong like it keeps hitting something. The Xbox won’t keep connect to live and the controller is bent.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One S : Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Bundle
customer_reviews.text: Great console and great game! Xbox Game Pass is such a great deal these days, the only caveat is download times! I have A.D.D and by the time the game finishes downloading I don’t want to play anymore. Microsoft caps you at 50Mbps download, which is just not fast enough when all the games are 20-40GB and more. They will need to improve this eventually especially with next generation consoles arriving soon. Microsoft does such a good job with build quality, both the console and controller feel rock solid. The fact that the One S plays 4K UHD movies adds so much value to the console at an already low price, kudos to MS for continuing to offer that.
customer_reviews.author: Yujen Huang

customer_reviews.title: Got all the games-the come in an email
customer_reviews.text: For everyone asking, The game codes come in a separate email from Amazon. We got all three games in the end. Will update my review after my husband has played it more. But for right now, he loves the it
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print. Picture is deceiving! Only get one game not the 3 shown😭
customer_reviews.text: Shows that there should be 3 games with the system. Only received one. When you read the fine print it only lists one. Kinda a bummer, really need to change the picture as it is false advertising and I did expect better from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: McNemar-Bowles

customer_reviews.title: make sure everyone tries to get the other 2 games
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and I ordered wednesday before Thanksgiving and had on my doorstep black friday. Great Product great price. The system was supposed to come with 3 games it only came with one . I am working with Amazon to try and get the other 2 games promised . This is not on the seller..
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Best xbox deal ive seen
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first because some reviews said they got a re-packaged box. I got exactly as described, brand new Xbox with controller, all the cords and the Jedi game with download. It’s been two months and I haven’t had any issues. With any new Xbox purchase With any new Xbox purchase you also get a free month of “ game pass” or online play, and can download a bunch of games to try them out but at the end of the month the games will go away and you’ll have to buy them if you want them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product-Brand New-No Scams
customer_reviews.text: Man...I missed the Black Friday deals and just wasn’t sure if I even wanted to spend almost $400 for a console and Star Wars game (which is hours of entertainment btw) BUT...$200...is it worth it? YES. Exactly as promised. Brand new in box with original packaging (I can tell the re-wraps). All equipment works and performs awesome. All the codes worked for everything. You don’t get the disc game, it’s an xox code to download to your system, but that’s pretty typical and they never promised that. I’m very happy with the console and am enjoying a bunch of games with the EA month free pass.
customer_reviews.author: David Bennett

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I turned it on it was very loud. I hadn't even put in a bluray yet. Like a constant buzzing sound. I only purchased this to watch blurays and it's nearly impossible. Please do not purchase this if you are even slightly annoyed loud systems. This is unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Blane R. Schippers

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: NO POWER CORD OR GAME CODE
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unfortunate review. I purchased this thinking I would receive a like new xbox. While, the xbox itself looks to be in good condition there was no power cord included in the packaging. I purchased a new power cord for $10 and turned on the xbox ready to redeem the game code only to fund out it had already been redeemed. After a lengthy and extremely unhelpful discussion with customer support they concluded they could not offer a partial refund for the defective code or the missing power cord and would only refund upon receiving the fully returned package. Extremely frustrating and cumbersome experience, DO NOT BUY THESE WAREHOUSE BUNDLES!
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Missing game code— replacement had a defective console
customer_reviews.text: Did not include codes for the bundles’ game (fallen order) or the free trial month for gamepass. Trying to contact someone to get it but not getting anywhere. Update: they sent me a bundle with the game Included- but this ones console was defective and had visual streaks and glitches in every game I tried to play on it. Bad product bundle I’m guessing because two tries got me poor results - defective or missing items
customer_reviews.author: Shane Driffill

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The box was basically crushed when I got it but the inner packaging protected the Xbox console. So far I have been using it for a week with zero issues. Have not yet tried to use the EA access, Xbox gold, or the gamepass codes, so I am hoping none of them were somehow previously used. Overall I’m very happy
customer_reviews.author: Carly Harris

customer_reviews.title: Xbox one S 1tb/ Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: Great console and great game! Xbox Game Pass is such a great deal. Microsoft does such a good job with build quality, both the console and controller feel rock solid. The fact that the One S plays 4K UHD movies adds so much value to the console at an already low price. The star wars game was great aswell and not a big star wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Missing promo codes for games, buy at your risk
customer_reviews.text: What I received in the bundle was the xbox, 1 month of xbox live gold, and the xbox gamer pass for 1 month. The only things that were missing were the digital codes for the games that were supposed to be included within this bundle. I should of really listened to the reviews that said that games were missing and that it is a struggle to even attempt to get the promotional codes for them. I would suggest not getting the bundle if you want it for the games.
customer_reviews.author: RedFox4747

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Honestly very surprised, Packaging was dinged up with a tear in the front. Open up the box to find everything in its proper place but there was a missing warning sticker below the dvd drive which indicates use. However upon review I could not seen any sign of use. Console completely clean, warranty sticker untouched and surprisingly all the codes work. Highly recommend as this is basically new with just the packaging being damaged but I don’t keep those anyway
customer_reviews.author: conrad

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Xbox One S so that my grandchildren could play with it when they visit or I babysit. It set up pretty easily, and they've played with it several times. My only complaint is that it takes several hours for a new game to be loaded, but I'm told that is always the case. So far, they have been enjoying it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Collins

customer_reviews.title: The seller is lying to you
customer_reviews.text: Package was waiting for me when i got home. I opened it to inspect that i got all of my things that came with the xbox and yes it was all there but once i booted it up i was unable to download the star wars game that was advertised with it because it was already redeemed. I could have bought the same xbox for $50 less in the same condition but opted to pay more for the game as well. This seller is false advertising. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Seth A Little

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product photos
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is pictured with three games only one game comes with the system.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Ordered one day got it the next. Setup was easy. Having trouble with one. One controller. It keeps freezing. Have to take out batteries to reset. Star Wars game was part of package. Download and install was simple. Playing the game is a whole other story though. But seeing as how I’m 70 years old......
customer_reviews.author: Elbert Eller

customer_reviews.title: Missing Shown Items
customer_reviews.text: I received this console, but be advised that the Star Wars game is a download, not a physical disc. Also, the Knights of the Old Republic games that were shown are NOT INCLUDED! I let Amazon know about this issue, but they refused to rectify the issue with the false advertising. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Larsen

customer_reviews.title: The S is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love the Xbox (yes, even with all the problems and bs). This is my 5th xbone, I've gotten them for friends and I've tried to help build the community. I am more satisfied with the s than the x tbh. I care more for functionality than graphics and that is the s, very functional and quiet. Good system.
customer_reviews.author: mAnBaNaNnAsLaM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. But need codes for other two games.
customer_reviews.text: The Jedi Fallen Order game download is included but not the other two as advertised. Excited to play it. Looks awesome. Would love to get the other two download codes as well. Not sure how.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Missing game
customer_reviews.text: The console is fine and is as advertised, but the game and codes for trials of products are missing. There should be at least a card with the download code in the box. It looks like it was taken out during damage inspection. I just want amazon to make it right, but can’t get ahold of anybody. Edit - Microsoft says the codes have been redeemed by somebody. No response from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Tballard

customer_reviews.title: Family fun and so much more.
customer_reviews.text: Son wanted this for Christmas and I needed a new Blu-ray player. This has served great for gaming, Blu-ray/DVD, and streaming. Only downside is that it doesn’t have AppleTV like the Roku stick did. Also never got the extra games that were offered at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: The console is great and we had no issue with the person we purchased it from. My son does not love the new star wars game. It is difficult to.navigate and he still hasn't been able to figure out how to play the game. That part is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This product never came with the Star Wars deluxe game that it said the Xbox one S was part of. I have checked my email and through the whole box and there is nothing. It has been 10 days now and I still have nothing. Also, this product should have been brand new but my packaging has been open before. There is a slight buzzing sound when the Xbox is on which means it is used. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Fleishman

customer_reviews.title: What a console!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this console for my daughter for her birthday, but I am liking it just as much as she does! I have even taken up playing the games we bought with this console....first time since the Atari det I had as a kid. Great for movies as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: packaging of the XBOX was terrible. It is amazing it worked
customer_reviews.text: the outside packaging of the xbox was so bad that the xbox carton experienced some damages. I had to take several pictures to prove that if the unit was damaged I could send it back unquestionable that it didn't work. Fortunately it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B. Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Defective..no support help
customer_reviews.text: Just got this Xbox one s brand new today and set it up before work ..come home to enjoy it and it DOESNT WORK ...and can't even talk to a real person about the. Problem...and now I'm out an Xbox I've worked hard for to get finally and this is what I get..thanks again Amazon services
customer_reviews.author: victor m

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: Our old Xbox took a dump suddenly and we really needed one to stream our services that we subscribe to. This came very fast and we're still using it today! It hold up great. Sleek, fast, and amazing!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have an xbox again!
customer_reviews.text: Our old xbox 1 disc's drive died, so we were happy to pick up a new one. We love our xbox, we play movies in it, play games and use it daily. My husband played and loved the Star Wars game as well.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Strictly for the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Strictly for the packaging. The box was just a little bit bigger than the unit with a half popped 4 air pillow cushioning. The unit itself looks intact, but I'm concerned about shipping, how often was it tossed or thrown, etc... I really hope the unit is okay. I will upgrade my review as time permits. Update, unit works fine, I just wish it was packaged a little better.
customer_reviews.author: P. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Starting off it works so that's good. The controller always sucks usually the right bumper button breaks and gets stuck no matter how many times I clean it out. Same with the Y button. Next when I bought this package it said it comes with Kotor 1 and 2 pretty sweet games if you are a star wars fan. But it didn't come with them up even when I contacted Amazon they said the deal had ended but it hadn't when I bought it. Be prepared to be screwed and to get a new controller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in my order.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a *NEW* Xbox S 1TB Fallen Order bundle. This doesnt look new at all. I would like a response for this. Extremely upsetting, the cost difference for a "brand new" to a "used looks like new" is large enough for me not to have to expect the disappointment that I currently have. I have a video of the un boxing of the items but it is having issues uploading to this review page. I request being contacted in response to this in which I would gladly provide the video via email or other means. Rating less than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Burkey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my niece as her first gaming console. the only thing I didn't like was the game is digital, but I'm old school this might be better so she doesn't lose the game.
customer_reviews.author: Marckenton eugene

customer_reviews.title: Apparently, kids like playing video games.
customer_reviews.text: Kids like the game system. They said it takes a little longer to load a game than a PlayStation. They really like otherwise. Apparently, kids like playing video games. Who new.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M. Armour

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: So much trouble when first got it to upgrade just so I can use it. And the controller does not work properly so I had to buy a new one. Will see how the console holds in time. Maybe I should of went with PlayStation
customer_reviews.author: jeffry thomas

customer_reviews.title: Missing games
customer_reviews.text: The product works but I did not recieve the 2 other games that was promised during the pre-order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing 2 out of 3 game codes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system just for the fact it says - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Bundle: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order - game code included Star Wars: Knights of The Old republic 1&2 - game codes NOT INCLUDED Where are the other 2 game codes?
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to redeem codes
customer_reviews.text: Best xbox yet I got this for 200 it’s way better than 360 it has all the bells and whistles it’s Aweosme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant use it because of update error...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get a chance to used this system. As soon as I start it up and connect to the internet, I have to update the system just so I can use the Xbox but every time I try to update it I get the same message “ there was a problem with the update” iv been working on it for over 2 and a half hours and this garbage console still doesn’t work. Never waste your money on a Xbox...
customer_reviews.author: Mighty_Voltic

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Xbox is awesome! Great purchase. Jedi game is really awesome! However I dunno what I was thinking getting a second one in the bedroom. Now the hubby and the kid are up late playing games together😭 I just wanna sleep 😴
customer_reviews.author: Xcavia

customer_reviews.title: Stupid wastes of time
customer_reviews.text: Literally got the wrong console Man you guys sucks had my hopes up for a console
customer_reviews.author: A verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why some people gave this bad reviews saying it was used. Mine is brand new, works and looks great. 5 stars for price and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Philly

customer_reviews.title: No game code, does not come with game.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the code for the game that comes with the bundle. Xbox support was a joke. Would not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Loud humming noise
customer_reviews.text: This system arrived with hardly any packing in the box which I believe the system got tossed around. Two days in the system gives this bad humming noise that has progressively gotten worse. Probably shouldn’t have purchased something like this online
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2days, already messed up for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Received two days ago. System already doesn’t work! Was working fine for 2 days and then boom suddenly won’t load anything at all. System turns on and then is a paper weight!! All the research I’ve done about this problem and all the “symptoms” with the system say it’s dead nothing will fix it if all the basic troubleshooting steps don’t help! They don’t help and my system is bricked. I expect a replacement or my money back!
customer_reviews.author: James d.

customer_reviews.title: Good COVID-19 option to keep our 18 year old home safe
customer_reviews.text: He's playing it and enjoying it. Yes the odd curse word especially when electricity goes out because of 100 plus temps. One day at a time but definitely a good addition to our household.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna M.Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal when I got it (black Friday deal)
customer_reviews.text: Great deal but weak console. Came with an amazing game but underpowered console made game look like garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew DiMasi

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be a refurbished xbox
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this item, no where could I find anything about opened box or refurbished in the description. When the item arrived, the box and contents showed signs of obvious use. I didn't even attempt to plugged it in. I just boxed it back up and sent it back. I ended up finding a great deal at Best Buy for the xbox one X model and purchased it. Yes, it was a little more, but I know that it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I think it’s crazy there are games my kids can only play if they are online. I also think it’s crazy we have to buy a game pass when we’re already paying for internet. But the system works great.
customer_reviews.author: Apriljeanrene

customer_reviews.title: Great console, Broken controller mic/headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: Console works great, but controller mic/headphone jack doesn't work with either mic or headphones. It works for a sec, but then cuts out. Tried with a different Xbox one controller and it worked perfectly. Sad :'(
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. It is much faster than his previous Xbox one. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Xbox1
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly i got the starwars bundle very good deal and is not all digital
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bundle!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bundle product. Received 2 of these and neither one included the Star Wars Fallen Order game code. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES A BARNETT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can not play Xbox 360 game's on this!!!!!!!! Lost all game's add-'s plus payed songs for Rock Smith !!!
customer_reviews.author: ShyDawg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk and bought a used one. And I couldn't be happier! I've never owned an Xbox before and really enjoy playing on it! And when I first opened the packaging (it was used so repackaged), I was expecting scratches or cosmetic flaws or at least buzzing when it was turned on. But it appeared without blemishes and with everything in the bundle. Very happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Scott Drake

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really need a review, it's awesome!!! Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.author: R. Lundberg <3

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy an xbox
customer_reviews.text: My xbox couldn’t update It was brand new and i didnt get to even use it cause it wont get even past the set up menu.. I bought a brand new one. Im waiting to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Yamil Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Really just using this to play Diablo 3. Tons of fun and no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy very happy with my purchase. The kids love it and the price was on point.
customer_reviews.author: Koncrete Kombat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great console with fallen order great new game to the saga
customer_reviews.author: ian yazel

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it. Came intact and well packaged for travel
customer_reviews.author: sandi n.

customer_reviews.title: Husband won’t stop using it
customer_reviews.text: Love that this plays Netflix, but my husband won’t get off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Shamelle

customer_reviews.title: Missing power cord
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to a friend but it didn’t have a power cord! WTH?
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Works great I use it to run my whole entertainment system
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Ron

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons Christmas gift and He hasn’t gotten off it yet. He loves it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Used and Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product Came opened and used. It looked as if someone also threw the Xbox box down stairs as it was ripped. This is not amazon's doing as it was inside an amazon box.
customer_reviews.author: T.F.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong game
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and in working order except that I got digital code for division 2 instead of starwars. It was starwars boxing and everything. Would of been 5 star
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My kid was so happy when she got this for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: American Sellers of the USA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in brand new PERFECT CONDITION. Works perfectly as well! Even recieved an email from the seller just to check and make sure everything was good with the order. I would definitely order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Resealed? Refurbished??
customer_reviews.text: Box appeared to be resealed! Or opened! Serial number was also changed on the box! And retaped. Was a Christmas gift from santa! So wasn't really a way to return it, since the kids wanted it open right away! Appears to work fine
customer_reviews.author: chad miller

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One S
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived when it was supposed to and the kids loved it for Christmas! So far everything works as it should, and the game was easily downloaded.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One S 1TB Console - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Bundle
customer_reviews.text: Wow, for the price, you CANT beat this purchace! 227.00 for the xbox. I'm impressed. Will definitely keep you in my list to buy from. Quickly shipped and packed for safety. Thank you. Michael
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I ordered. So far theres no problems. Everything is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Didnt receive some products
customer_reviews.text: Its great but I was supposed to receive the 2 downloadable games too and they didnt come with it
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Xbox!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its an Xbox One with free Jedi game!! Love it! 😎👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing games
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the other 2 games that were advertised. Please send me codes of these so I can download them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Controller damage
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped fast and the console works great. Only issue I had was with the controller. Some of the buttons are not responding and have even ran a diagnostic test showing the controller was not responding properly. I think it would be wise to test the functionality of the devices before being shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: How will Amazon fix this?
customer_reviews.text: As many others have mentioned, this was advertised as having three games but only came with one. It was advertised as a bundle and included KOTOR 1&2 as well. Amazon - how can you help folks like me who were misled?
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for sure
customer_reviews.text: The outside package had minor damage and the Xbox came perfect and the codes were all there and as much as i was anxious about this purchase it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Slater

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves this thank you for the wonderful service
customer_reviews.author: JAMILA COUNTS

customer_reviews.title: Where da codes at
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. I didn’t receive the two game codes that were in the product description,
customer_reviews.author: Shania Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: they issued half of my refund when the invoice stated I would receive the full refund and they’d didn’t give me a reason why . the game system wasn’t up to its expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Clineceia McCall

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: My grands live it. I wish it came with 2 controllers but it is a good price for the quality
customer_reviews.author: DiamondDiva

customer_reviews.title: great entertainment console
customer_reviews.text: bought it for all the apps i can run and its great. I have an older LCD 75in tv and this is great and ups the resolution too!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good game and needed a new xbox so great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Ekey

customer_reviews.title: Xbox 1
customer_reviews.text: Came right on time and is brand new like expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came fully packaged, no damage. All the codes worked! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Outer package was a little rough from shipping but Xbox package was perfect. Set up went good got more promo codes than expected so that's a plus as well
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love it, arrived early and unsuspected. Thank you Amazon. I Highly recommend! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Lopaeva

product_meta.title: Xbox One S 1TB Console - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Bundle
product_meta.description:
Edition:S 1TB - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Bundle

Own the Xbox One S Star Wars Jedi: Fallen order Bundle and experience the thrill and challenge of becoming a Jedi. Step into the role of a Jedi padawan who narrowly escaped the purge of order 66. Engage in innovative lightsaber and force combat on a galaxy-spanning adventure as you stay One step ahead of the Empire and its deadly inquisitors. Continue your training, explore the mysteries of the force and become the Jedi you were meant to be. This bundle includes an Xbox One S, an Xbox wireless Controller, a full-game download of Star Wars Jedi: Fallen order Deluxe Edition, a month Xbox Live Gold subscription, a month Xbox Game Pass for Console trial, and month of EA access. Whether you're playing games, watching 4K movies, or streaming gameplay, there's never been a better time to game with Xbox One.

If purchased through Xbox All Access, the bundle includes 24-month subscription to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate includes Xbox Live Gold, Xbox Game Pass for Console, Xbox Game Pass for PC, and other benefits; game catalog varies over time. Internet access required (ISP fees apply). Membership conversion: your existing Xbox Live Gold and Xbox Game Pass membership(s) will automatically convert to Ultimate at a conversion ratio, learn more xbox.com/gamepass. Digital Direct: Your 24-month Xbox Game Pass Ultimate membership is delivered directly to your console during set-up and is available in Settings; no codes required. Warranty: console is under a 1 year limited hardware warranty (90 days for controller/accessories) regardless of length of financing. (Microsoft Limited Hardware Warranty: https://support.microsoft.com/warranty). Upgrade: Upgrade option after the equivalent of 18 payments for the next Xbox console only, coming Holiday 2020 (excludes Xbox One X, S, and S All Digital Edition). New contract, terms, and pricing apply. Requires return of console in good condition. The next Xbox console available under the upgrade option is subject to FCC rules and will comply with the appropriate FCC rules when available. See product and upgrade terms at Xbox.com/XboxAllAccessTerms.

With approval of Citizens One Line of Credit at 0% APR and 24-month term. Subject to individual credit approval. Total payment amount from $551.76; taxes, shipping, and other charges are extra and may vary (estimated retail price with Xbox One S console; prices will vary by console and retailer). See Citizens One Line of Credit Agreement at https://www.citizensone.com/XAA for full terms and conditions.

**Savings based on Estimated Retail Price of items sold separately; actual savings may vary. See retailer for details.

NOTE: The two games available in the pre-order bundle are digital. The pre-order bonus does not include any physical games.
feature_bullets: Bundle includes: Xbox One S 1TB console, Xbox Wireless Controller, full-game download of Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Deluxe Edition, 1-Month of Xbox Live Gold, a 1-Month trial of Xbox Game Pass for Console, and 1-Month of EA Access
If purchased through Xbox All Access: Enjoy low monthly payments for 24 months, no upfront cost, access to over 100 high-quality games and online multiplayer. Plus console upgrade option

Get the story behind the game with the Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Deluxe Edition, including a cosmetic skin for BD-1, a cosmetic skin for the Stinger Mantis, a Digital Art Book, and a “Director’s Cut” featuring behind-the-scenes videos containing over 90 minutes of footage from the making of the game

Experience iconic and familiar planets, weapons, gear, and enemies while meeting a roster of fresh characters, locations, creatures, droids, and adversaries new to Star Wars on a galaxy-spanning adventure
Develop your connection to the force and tap into powerful Force abilities for exploration and combat Master the iconic lightsaber in thoughtful and innovative combat
